description:
Shijaku is an admiral of an unspecified nation, who joined Altana Liberation Army and became one of its leaders.
His real name is Barkas and he is one of the three princes of planet Oukoku, other being his long lost young brother prince http://anidb.net/ch1677 [Hata], and his long lost older brother http://anidb.net/ch1166 [Dragonia].
Source: Gintama Wiki
name: Shijaku
